Question: This person kills the Jedi and kidnaps the man's young Force-sensitive son, whom he raises as his secret apprentice.
Hints: Cheney's wife, Lynne, presented Stewart with a this person action figure on her appearance on the show on October 10, 2007.
Many films and television series have paid homage to this person.
This person received the Ultimate Villain recognition at the 2011 Scream Awards.
